scenario_text.value:
Uh, hey, Takuma. You know that Syakomon
wasn’t telling the truth back there, right?!

Of course I know. I wouldn’t believe that you
are a liar.

But not just that... She said I lie about the
things I like and hate...

If I like something, I’ll say so! Same if
I can’t stand it!

Oh, you mean that part? Still, it’s not like
you actually hate Kaito, right?
Oh, uh... I’m not serious about that...
Argh! YOU’RE the one I hate, Takuma!

That monster’s wrong. If I like something,
I’ll say so. Same if I hate something!
